ownable.persons
Class Person

java.lang.Object
  ownable.persons.Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

A class of persons involving a relation with things they own.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Eric Steegmans

canHaveAsOwning

@Raw
public boolean canHaveAsOwning(@Raw
                                   Ownable ownable)
Check whether this person can have the given ownable as one of its ownings.

Parameters:
ownable - The ownable to check.
Returns:
True if the given ownable is effective, if that ownable can have this person as its owner, and either this person does not have the given ownable as one of its ownings or the given ownable references this person as its owner; false otherwise. | result == | (ownable != null) && | ownable.canHaveAsOwner(this) && | ( (! hasAsOwning(ownable)) || | (ownable.getOwner() == this) )

getNbOwnings

public int getNbOwnings()
Return the number of ownings of this person.

Returns:
The total number of ownings of this person. result == | { ownable:Ownable | hasAsOwning(ownable) }.size()

getTotalFoodAmount

public java.math.BigInteger getTotalFoodAmount(int days)
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                               java.lang.IllegalStateException
Return the total amount of food needed to feed all dogs owned by this person during the given number of days.

Parameters:
days - The given number of days.
Returns:
The total amount of food needed to feed all dogs owned by this person during the given number of days. | let | myDogs = { dog: Dog | hasAsOwning(dog) } | in | result == {{ myDogs.getFoodAmount()*days }}.sum()
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - [must] This person is already terminated. | isTerminated()
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [must] This person is not yet terminated and the given number of days is negative. | (! this.isTerminated()) && (days < 0)

Return a painting owned by this person and painted by the given painter.

painter - The painter to search for.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - [must] This person is already terminated. | isTerminated()

getTotalFor

public java.math.BigInteger getTotalFor(filters.BigIntegerExtractor extractor)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.lang.IllegalStateException
Return the total value of all the things owned by this person using the given extractor.

Parameters:
extractor - The extractor to be used in evaluate all ownings of this person.
Returns:
The total amount returned by applying the given extractor to all things owned by this person. | result == | {{ extractor.getValueFor(ownable) in BigInteger | | hasAsOwning(ownable) }}.sum()
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - [must] This person is already terminated. | isTerminated()
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [must] This person us not yet terminated and the given extractor is not effective. | (! this.isTerminated()) && (extractor == null)
